ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... All to true my friend.  But on the bright side of things, had we never been created, we won t be in this war either. She turned and looked at the Ark.

::Spears::
"All to true my friend.  But on the bright side of things, had we 
never been created, we won't be in this war either."
She turned and looked at the Ark.
"You know, we can do a few things about the ship though.  We can 
scrap the Ark and build a totally new ship from the parts.  We can 
rebuild and fix the old ship and bring it back into functional order.
Or do something totaly different.  Go and steal one.  But I think 
you'll find that one of the first two choices to your liking."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus looks a bit confused, never having heard of barbecue sause 
before. 
> "It'd probably go well with ...  BBQ sause. The only problem is 
that we would 
> probably never be created, so we won't be there to find out."
